name: 喻沐英
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation
Week 2: Pronunciation
Week 3: Cinema and Theatre
Week 4: Grammar and Listening
Week 5: Food and Culture
Week 6: Grammar and Listening
Week 7: Music and Pop Culture
Week 8: TOEIC 
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Gallery and Museum
Week 11: Grammar and Listening
Week 12: Stay Healthy and Fit
Week 13: Grammar and Listening
Week 14: Literary Enjoyment
Week 15: Grammar and Listening
Week 16: Travel and Adventure
Week 17: TOEIC
Week 18: Final Exam - 5 mins speech
scorePolicy:
